name: Tropical
description: Average temperature of 18 °C (64.4 °F) or higher every month of the year with significant precipitation

name: Dry
description: Low precipitation in a region that does not fit the polar (EF or ET) criteria of no month with an average temperature greater than 10 °C (50 °F)

name: Temperate
description: Has the coldest month averaging between 0 °C (32 °F)(or ?3 °C (26.6 °F)) and 18 °C (64.4 °F) and at least one month averaging above 10 °C (50 °F)

name: Continental
description: Has at least one month averaging below 0 °C (32 °F) (or ?3 °C (26.6 °F)) and at least one month averaging above 10 °C (50 °F)

name: Polar
description: Has every month of the year with an average temperature below 10 °C (50 °F)
